abstract: “Put the Needle on the Record: The 1980s at 45 Revolutions Per Minute,” a new book by Matthew Chojnacki, looks at the distinctive album cover art of the 1980s — good and bad.
snippet: “Put the Needle on the Record: The 1980s at 45 Revolutions Per Minute,” a new book by Matthew Chojnacki, looks at the distinctive album cover art of the 1980s — good and bad.

headline.main: New Book Covers the Covers of the 1980s
